mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER ( user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_email, user_birth, user_profile ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{userPw}, #{name}, #{email}, DATE_FORMAT(#{birth}, '%Y-%m-%d'), #{profile} )
mapper.select: SELECT USER_NO AS userNo, USER_ID AS userId, USER_PW AS userPw, user_name as name, user_email AS email, user_birth AS birth, user_profile AS profile FROM USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND USER_PW = #{userPw}
